Package transmittal.com.tbitsGlobal.server.cache

Interface Summary
ITrnCache Interface for Cache's to be used in the Transmittal Plugin Each new Cache has to implement this and register/add itself to the cache manager
 

Class Summary
AbstractTrnCache<T extends TbitsModelData> Abstract class for all the cache's for transmittal plugin.
PostTrnFieldMapCache  
PostTrnFieldMapReader  
PostTrnFieldMapWriter Handles the modifications to PostTransmittalFieldMap table Implement the writeback methods to update the changes in configuration back to database
SrcTargetFieldMapCache  
SrcTargetFieldMapReader This is called when the lookup in srcTargetFieldMapCache fails.
SrcTargetFieldMapWriter This Class is invoked when a data item in the cache is updated/deleted/entered The methods to update/delete/insert the entries are defined in this.
TrnCache  
TrnCacheManager This is a global manager for all the cache's defined for transmittal plugin Any new cache instance must first register/add itself with this in order to be activated.
